comments.text:
I have added on my Mac the iCal caldav URL so I can get the calendars from MobileMe (soon iCloud)

What I would love is, through Firefox Sync, be able to synchronize these CalDAV sources so that they appear on my Linux laptop. (that's what MobileMe Sync does on the Mac: it synchronize external CalDAV source, and let iCal fetch the content)

comments.text:
For subscribed calendars this should be pretty easy, just have sync watch the calendar.registry.* prefs and filter out any calendars that are local. The sortorder might be a bit more complicated, since it needs to be merged.

Maybe someone could provide some links to the sync interfaces so we can see what needs to be done.

Thanks for filing the bug, I have had this in mind for some time, but never got around to actually filing it.
